title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons do not appear in the 'Available Items' section of the Data Source in the software.
EB: When expanding the 'Data Source' in the 'Available Items' section, the table icons and column icons should be visible.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new project.
2. Create a new report.
3. In the 'Data Explorer' view, create a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database. Set the following properties:
- Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
- Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
- User Name: root
- Password: root
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset.
5. In the 'Edit Data Set' window, select 'Query'.
6. (Additional steps may be required here to trigger the issue, if not already mentioned in the original bug report.)
